ingredients.ingredient: 1 tablespoon olive oil, divided, or as needed
2 tablespoons freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, or to taste
2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar, or to taste
2 tablespoons sherry vinegar, or to taste

cookingTips: Leave lettuce halves intact to hold together while grilling
Oil the grill grates well to prevent sticking
Grill cut-side down first for char marks and caramelization
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can you achieve nice char marks on lettuce while keeping it tender inside?
